description: Brugmansia 'Pink Perfume' is an amazing plant species. The vibrant and delicate pink blooms will instantly create a showstopping focal point in your garden. Unlike many other flowers, Brugmansia 'Pink Perfume' blooms in autumn and releases an aroma which is sheer heavenly. The cascading trumpet-shaped flowers drape from the arching branches, creating an exquisite statement piece. Plant in a sunny spot in well-drained soil for a magnificent display that will be sure to bring your garden to life.
